heading: What Is Islam?
title: إِنَّ الدِّينَ عِندَ اللَّهِ الْإِسْلَامُ
paragraph: 'Indeed, the religion in the sight of Allah is Islam.' (Qur'an 3:19)

heading: Who is Muhammad (P.B.U.H)?
title: وَمَا أَرْسَلْنَاكَ إِلَّا رَحْمَةً لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
paragraph: 'And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.' (Qur'an 21:107)

heading: What is the purpose of life?
title: وَمَا خَلَقْتُ الْجِنَّ وَالْإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُونِ
paragraph: 'And I did not create the jinn and mankind except to worship Me.' (Qur'an 51:56)
